manipulation.image.JPEG

Class JPEGCodec

  • java.lang.Object
    • manipulation.image.JPEG.JPEGCodec
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Codec

    public class JPEGCodec
extends java.lang.Object
implements Codec

    Class used to handle JPEG files, allowing embedding and recovery of hidden messages.

                  throws java.lang.Exception

        Reads a file from a byte array.

        Reads a given JPEG byte array

        Specified by:
        decodeStream in interface Codec
        Parameters:
        imageBytes - the array containing the file
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • embedCapacity

        public int embedCapacity(int acForMessage)

        Gets the embedding capacity for a hidden message in the JPEG structure.

        Parameters:
        acForMessage - the degradation value specifying how many AC values are used for the message
        Returns:
        an integer value containing the maximum capacity supported

      • encode_msg

        public void encode_msg(byte[] message,
                       java.lang.String passwordKey,
                       int acForMessage)
                throws MessageTooLargeException

        Embeds a given hidden message into the file structure.

        Provides embedding of a message in the current JPEG structure.

        Specified by:
        encode_msg in interface Codec
        Parameters:
        message - the message to be embedded
        passwordKey - a key which can be used in the embedding
        acForMessage - a value to change the degradation level of the embedding
        Throws:
        MessageTooLargeException

      • decode_msg

        public byte[] decode_msg(java.lang.String passwordKey)
                  throws MessageTooLargeException,
                         java.lang.Exception

        Recovers a message from the file structure.

        Must be able to extract the same message embedding in encode_msg.

        Provides recovery of a message from the current JPEG structure.

        Specified by:
        decode_msg in interface Codec
        Parameters:
        passwordKey - a key which can be used in the recovery
        Returns:
        byte array of the hidden message
        Throws:
        MessageTooLargeException
        java.lang.Exception

      • genStego

        public byte[] genStego()
                throws java.lang.Exception

        Produces a byte array containing the file (with any modifications made).

        The returned file must be of the same format of the one the Codec reads, and must include any embedded hidden messages.

        Converts the JPEG into a byte array format.

        Specified by:
        genStego in interface Codec
        Returns:
        byte array containing the file
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
